entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers early this evening. Fog patches overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Tuesday 25 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Showers. High 7.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Showers beginning near noon. Risk of a thunderstorm late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 7. Wind chill minus 5 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Tuesday 25 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 7. POP 40%
